text: Live at the Crystal Ballroom is a concert video by American rock band The Black Keys. It was released on November 18, 2008 and was produced and directed by Lance Bangs. The concert was filmed on April 4, 2008 at their show in Portland, Oregon at the Crystal Ballroom. ==Track listing== All songs written by Dan Auerbach and Patrick Carney. # "Same Old Thing" # "Girl Is On My Mind" # "Set You Free" # "Thickfreakness" # "Stack Shot Billy" # "Busted" (extended outro) # "You're the One" # "Remember When (Side B)" # "Your Touch" # "Oceans and Streams" # "Strange Times" # "Psychotic Girl" # "10 A.M. Automatic" # "No Trust" # "I Got Mine" # "All You Ever Wanted" # "'Till I Get My Way" ==Personnel== *Dan Auerbach – vocals, guitars *Patrick Carney – drums, percussion, producer ==References== Category:The Black Keys albums Category:2008 live albums Category:2008 video albums Category:Live video albums Category:Films directed by Lance Bangs
title: Live at the Crystal Ballroom
